statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPIAMRole)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP IAM roles that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPIAMRole)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPIAMRole-to-Project relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace)-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject)-[:RESOURCE]->(n:GCPRole) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP IAM Roles that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace)-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject)-[r:RESOURCE]->(:GCPRole) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Project to IAM Roles relationships that are out of date

name: Cleanup GCP IAM roles, workloadIdentityPools, workloadIdentityPoolsProviders and Service Accounts.
